lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said orders for long-lasting manufactured goods plunged 5.1 percent last month, the biggest drop since August 2014, after slipping 0.5 percent in November.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Orders for Durable Goods Fell 5.1% in December
headline.main: New Orders for Durable Goods Slumped in December

snippet: The Commerce Department said orders for long-lasting manufactured goods plunged 5.1 percent last month, the biggest drop since August 2014, after slipping 0.5 percent in November.
abstract: Commerce Department reports 5.1 percent drop in durable goods orders for December 2015, most likely due to falling demand for commercial aircraft.
